PositionHistory.Title: Consultant & Lead Data Analyst
PositionHistory.Description: Comscore (US) Consultant & Lead Data Analyst (2014 - till Date) Payroll: Indecomm Global services Product: Subscriber Analytix- A CRM product for telecom operators in BSS/OSS field. A subscriber-centric Business Intelligence for Marketing, Customer Care & Network teams. Marketing: Revenue Reporting(billing), Media/Content provider Analysis, Options/Tariffs, Dealer Analysis, Device Customer care: Network Performance(QoS), Trouble Ticket Management, Location Updates, Faire Usage Policy • Client Interactions- Key liaison between the clients(Telecom Operators) and the technical team in US Key Responsibilities • Acting as a Telecom Domain Consultant for GSM, GPRS, EDGE, UMTS and LTE Networks. • Translating Business Requirements into technical requirements that can be used by the Development team and solution design • Supporting Business Analysts in understanding the inputs, calculations and outputs required for a new implementation based on sample files provided by the customer • Cross Team interactions with Product Management, Development, DA and QA Teams • Big Data Analysis and Data Modelling for various data feeds Client Visits • Visits to US and Thailand for client interactions and presentations PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE

PositionHistory.Title: Business Development Manager
PositionHistory.Description:
MahindraComviva Technologies Ltd Manager (2012 - 2014) Role: Business Development Manager Region: Europe, Middle East and North Africa VAS Products: Campaign Analytics, Customer Segmentation, Winback Loyalty Solution, Recommendation Engine, Partner Management, Revenue Planning, SMSC, MMSC, USSD, SDP • Pre-Sales • Account Mining for some of the Key Accounts in Middle East and Europe • Product Positioning & Product Marketing based on the Industry Requirement • Preparing Case Studies and Sales deck for product pitches and client meetings Key Responsibilities • Proposal Planning: Understanding clients requirements, engaging right teams, creating and finalizing bid plan with key stakeholders and finalizing structure of proposals response • Bid management- Handling the RFP/RFQ/RFI proposals from various clients • Business Development • Lead Generation for Campaign Analytics. • Product Pricing, Costing of the entire project(P&L)and maintaining EBITA margins • Analysing requirements for customer value management products and Analytics • Interactions with Product Unit Head and CXO's to prepare a winning proposal and getting required approvals • Quotation Analysis: Determine the deal price based on historical data • Customize systems & services offerings bundle based on the requirements • Cross Team interactions with Customer Solution team, Product Management, Engineering, Support and Sales team to prepare a compelling proposal. • Closed deals worth $4 Million for FY12-13 • Influenced Key decision Makers in operators through realistic Business cases & presentations to CXO executives. Achievements • Reduced revenue losses and enhanced retention of major and at risk accounts using negotiation skills. • Supported sales representatives on sales calls and built rapport with key customers • Anchor your customer: An Initiative to bring about a customer delight through proactive Professional Initiatives engagement PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE
Email: rajanishsd.iiml@gmail.com PH: +91-9900080830

PositionHistory.Title: Technical Lead
PositionHistory.Description: Huawei Technologies India PVT. LTD Technical Lead (2006 - 2010) Domain: VoIP, IMS & SS7 (4 Years) VOIP/IMS • Developed & Managed Protocol stacks (MRCP, SIP, DIAMETER(Billing), H.248, Megaco, SCCP, Domain RTP, RTCP, AAL2) Experience • Familiar with most of the 3GPP, ITU, IETF Standards and also made contributions to the standards • Led a team of 4 through the SW development life cycle from Pre-Technical Research till delivery • Simultaneously managed 3 teams to set objectives & supervised the team till project completion Key • Single point of contact for clients in Functional Requirement Gathering and Issue Resolution Responsibilities processes • Proficient in both Waterfall and Agile SDLC Methodologies Continuous Integration System (Huawei Technologies) • Conceptualized an Automated Code Verification System for code management saving 1 person day of effort Professional • Awarded Best Contributor Award for conceptualizing and developing the automated system at Initiatives Huawei Business Impact • The system was later incorporated as part of the delivery process and extended to all the Business Units • Awarded Gold Medal from the Huawei headquarters for ensuring High quality Deliverables (Zero Defects). Key • Conferred with COO's Incentive Award for providing Quick Solutions for Complex Network Issues Achievements • Honoured with the Team Player Award for exhibiting Team Spirit. • Received VPP Monthly Award for improving the performance resulting in direct increase in Revenues • Received R-version Monthly Award for outstanding contributions in project management SUMMER INTERNSHIP

PositionHistory.Title: Conceptualized New IT Support
PositionHistory.Description:
HCL Infosystem, Noida IT Products and Services April 2011- June2011 Project brief: Productize IT Services and develop GTM strategy Deliverables • Conceptualized New IT Support services for PC, Laptops and Tablets • Analysed various Competitors and Designed the GTM strategy for the new services • Identified the Up sell opportunities for newly identified services in support streams. • Developed Green IT Support services based on the Indian Government Policy CONSULTING PROJECTS (IIM Lucknow) Company/Event Results Contributions Winner(Cash • Assessed the Feasibility of setting up a profitable plant in BOPP packaging BMGI (BOPP) Prize Industry • Winner of 1 Live project of the Flagship program " Consultants of the Year" st Rs.20000) Which? Right Winner(Cash • Conducted Market research for UK's Leading Magazine brand "Which? Right Choice Prize Choice" Magazine Rs.25000) Smart Head Winner(Cash • Devised the Market Entry Strategy for business consulting in Indian SME Strategy Prize space Solutions Rs.10000) • Developed the Market Research Plan to understand the current challenges Red Seer Finalist faced by the Family Owned Businesses with assets ranging from Rs 50cr - Consulting Rs.1000cr • Assessed the strategy to move from NBFC towards Banking services in rural M&M Finance Live Case segments Service Ltd Study • Evaluated the opportunity of entering into rural markets of other countries Reckitt • Conducted Market Research through a Disguised Marketing Game to assess the 1/13 (Index) Benckiser consumer perception Uninor 3/25(Index) • Assessed the perception of Dynamic Pricing scheme by uninor
Email: rajanishsd.iiml@gmail.com PH: +91-9900080830

Degree.Comments: Year Institute Degree 2010-12 IIM, Lucknow PGDM(Marketing & Systems)

2002-06 NIT Surathkal (NITK) B.E. (Information Technology) • Total of 7 years of professional experience in Telecom domain with 2 year full time MBA • Experience in Business Development, Consulting, Product Management and Analytics • International Exposure- Experience handling Europe, US, Asia Pacific, Middle East and North Africa customers • Awarded the title of "Consultant of the Year" out of 46 participating teams at IIM Lucknow

sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:Description: RAJANISH S D's experience appears to be concentrated in Sales / General, with exposure to Information Technology / Project Management. RAJANISH S D has 9 years of work experience, with 9 years of management experience, including a mid-level position.
sov:ExperienceSummary.sov:ManagementStory: Current position is a low-level management role: Consultant & Lead Data Analyst Starting on 1/1/2014, the candidate held the following low-level management position for 18 months: Title: Consultant & Lead Data Analyst for Comscore (US) Starting on 1/1/2012, the candidate held the following mid-level management position for 2 years: Title: Business Development Manager for MahindraComviva Technologies Ltd Starting on 1/1/2006, the candidate held the following low-level management position for 5 years: Title: Technical Lead for Huawei Technologies India PVT. LTD
